spec_data.Name: git-review
spec_data.Description:
An extension for source control system Git that creates and manages review
requests in the patch management system Gerrit. It replaces the rfc.sh script.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 01 Aug 2017 04:16:32 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A Git helper for integration with Gerrit
